links.name: Hashnode: Also write in Webd Essentials publication

milestones.title: Was introduced programming
milestones.description: I was in 11th grade when I was introduced to programming, Basically I was introduced to C++ because it was in my school curriculum but didn't got addicted to it.

milestones.title: Bought my first laptop
milestones.description: I bought my first laptop and started with java and cpp, learned them a little bit.

milestones.title: Started learning JavaScript
milestones.description: I got an awesome javascript framework (P5.js) and started learning JavaScript with Daniel Shiffman's videos on youtube and made a lot board games.

milestones.title: Completed my senior secondary education
milestones.description: I completed my senior secondary education and got admission in a university through JEE Mains (one of toughest exam in the world) .

milestones.title: Made my first website using HTML and CSS
milestones.description: I made my first website using HTML and CSS. I was so excited that I could create a website from scratch. I was so happy that I could create something that I could show to my friends and family.

milestones.title: Started learning ReactJS
milestones.description: Learned react and made a lot of projects

milestones.title: Joined My first internship as a fullStack web developer
milestones.description: I joined my first internship as a fullStack MERN web developer.

milestones.title: Started doing Open Source
milestones.description: I started doing open source. I started contributing to open source projects on GitHub.

milestones.title: Became active on social media
milestones.description: I became active on LinkedIn and Twitter and started sharing my experiences and knowledge with others. I found tech-twitter an awesome community. I also started sharing my knowledge on LinkedIn.

milestones.title: Started algebra-for-you (Open Source)
milestones.description: I started my own open source project to understand how things work.

milestones.title: Started Writing Blogs
milestones.description: I started writing blogs on Hashnode. I write about web development, programming, and freelancing. I also write about my journey as a freelancer and web developer.

milestones.title: Started writing blogs on Web development ( beginners)
milestones.description: I started writing blogs on Web development for absolute beginners on Hashnode. There I cover basic HTML, CSS and Javascript
